text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Wednesday’s episode, Gaurang Shah, head of market strategist At Geojit Financial Services and Sameet Chavan, chief analyst of technical and derivatives at Angel Broking gave their views on Gujarat Pipavav, Lupin, Tata Motors, Tata Steel, Siyaram Silk and many more.
title: Should You Invest In Gujarat Pipavav, Lupin, Tata Motors, Tata Steel, Siyaram Silk? #AskBQ
